MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG1 and DG2 postcode area of Dumfries.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.49pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.11AM on 25th November 2020.
